entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Simplify initialization of local scope based on `scoped` modifier #66079
    17.5
  • Compiler errors for duplicate modifiers are inconsistent #66077
  • Unnecessary temp for side-effecting elements in deconstruction assignment #66074
  • Visual Basic: "Object initialization can be simplified (IDE0017)" wrong indent with custom tab/indent size #66071
  • Buttons in "Change signature" dialog have low contrast when High Contrast is enabled #66070

Closed

  • Can't access extension methods via base expressions #66080
  • Generic type argument inference fails in the face of implicit cast (e.g. Span<T> to ReadOnlySpan<T>) #66072
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33219.200 #66068
  • Unexpected error for a record primary constructor parameter #66067
  • Selenium WebDriver for .Net 6.0 do`nt starts in C# Interactive #66066
  • Unexpected ref safety error reported with `out _` with C#7.2 ref safety rules #65651
    17.5
  • Ref safety errors reported for deconstruction assignment with discard #65522
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Add unique color scheme for high contrast mode #66082
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers
  • Support netmodules in `MetadataReference` factory methods #66076
    Area-Compilers
  • Block `default(delegate*<void>...enum)` in attributes #66073
    Area-Compilers
  • Option store #66069
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Avoid reporting ref safety errors for discard assignments #65693
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • OptionKey clean-up and integration tests #66016
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust calculation of invocation escape when return type is ref to ref struct #65857
    Area-Compilers
  • Only examine a PEReference once when walking projects to produce inheritance tree #66043
    Area-IDE
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixes and improvements for Run Code Analysis command #66010
    Area-Analyzers
  • Produce error when static local function captures a local with extension method method group conversion #65965
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implement new lookup rules for Primary Constructor parameters #66054
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Emit and report missing `Decimal-` and `DateTimeConstantAttribute` #65777
    Area-Compilers
  • Correctly parse local function with several async modifiers #66030
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable switch dispatch for is-expressions #65874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [WIP] Implementation of new Visitors, Walkers and Rewriters as laid out in #62647 #65139
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Deprecate public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #64083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Use the inner pattern to recreate the decision DAG for is-expressions #65878
    Area-Compilers, Community
